title: Midnight Panther
synopsis: Based on the Best-Selling Comics From CPM Manga! The traveling musical group The Pussycats is the hottest thing around. Lou, Kei and Sonya are three, sexy singers with a legion of screaming fans in every town. But these pussycats have claws.
voices: ['Yamaguchi, Yuriko', 'Asami, Junko', 'Uchikawa, Ai', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Furuta, Nobuyuki', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Tsukui, Kyousei']
staff: [['Kageyama, Shigenori', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Rinshin', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Ooshiro, Tsutomu', ['Key Animation']]]
